---
title: "Data Summary"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	echo = FALSE,
	message = FALSE,
	warning = FALSE
)
library(tidyverse)
library(summarytools)
library(janitor)
library(htmltools)
```

## {.tabset}

### Child Encounter
```{r}
child_encounter <- read_csv("data/IDR-PICU-091720/PICU-child_encounter_data.csv") %>% 
  clean_names() 

includeHTML(view(dfSummary(child_encounter, graph.col = FALSE)))

```
